name: RE:fract (Global Game Jam 2020)
description:
GLOBAL GAME JAM 2020 

RE:Fract is a 2d action/platformer game where your sword grants you the power to switch between two versions of the world; a broken and fixed version. 

Controls:

ARROW KEYS  = Move

W = Attack

F = Interact

TAB = Dash

Spacebar = Jump

ESC = Pause

Credit:

- Thanh Tung Nguyen: Programmer

- Shifat Khan: Programmer

- DeeAndre Mac Andrew: Programmer

- Taqi Haque: Programmer
